import React from 'react' import './payment.css' import paypalImage from '../../images/paypal.png'; import razorPayImage from '../../images/razorpay.svg' import cashOnDelivery from '../../images/cod.png' import card from '../../images/card.png' import { PaymentScheme } from '../../validation/formValidation'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup' function Payment() { const {register,handleSubmit, formState:{errors}} = useForm({ resolver:yupResolver(PaymentScheme) }) const selectPayment =()=>{ console.log(); } return (
